<h3 id="X32062">X(32062) = CENTROID OF THE ANTI-EXCENTERS-REFLECTIONS TRIANGLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b^2+c^2)*a^6-(b^2-3*c^2)*(3*b^2-c^2)*a^4+3*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2-(b^4+10*b^2*c^2+c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(32062) = 4*X(4)-X(185) = 5*X(4)-2*X(389) = 11*X(4)-5*X(3567) = 3*X(4)-X(5890) = 7*X(4)-X(6241) = 13*X(4)-7*X(9781) = 7*X(4)-4*X(10110) = 2*X(4)+X(11381) = 5*X(4)+X(12290) = 13*X(4)-4*X(13382) = X(4)+2*X(13474) = 5*X(51)-4*X(389) = 11*X(51)-10*X(3567) = 3*X(51)-2*X(5890) = 7*X(51)-2*X(6241) = 13*X(51)-14*X(9781) = 7*X(51)-8*X(10110) = 3*X(3917)-4*X(5891) = 5*X(3917)-8*X(15060) = 7*X(3917)-8*X(15067) = X(3917)-4*X(16194) = 2*X(5891)-3*X(15030) = 5*X(5891)-6*X(15060) = 7*X(5891)-6*X(15067) = X(5891)-3*X(16194) = 5*X(15030)-4*X(15060) = 7*X(15030)-4*X(15067) = 7*X(15060)-5*X(15067) = 2*X(15060)-5*X(16194) = 2*X(15067)-7*X(16194)</b>
<p>X(32062) lies on these lines:
{4,51}, {5,14855}, {6,14490}, {20,3819}, {24,11204}, {25,10606}, {30,3917}, {33,32065}, {34,11189}, {52,3853}, {53,1562}, {64,5198}, {74,13603}, {125,1596}, {154,1593}, {184,1597}, {235,23332}, {373,381}, {376,5650}, {378,1495}, {382,5562}, {428,15311}, {511,3543}, {546,10575}, {1154,3627}, {1204,1598}, {1216,5073}, {1498,11402}, {1531,31723}, {1533,15760}, {1656,14641}, {1843,2781}, {1885,16621}, {1906,6247}, {1907,2883}, {1974,10249}, {2390,12688}, {2393,12294}, {2777,7576}, {2979,3146}, {3091,6688}, {3292,18451}, {3357,10594}, {3426,10605}, {3529,11793}, {3534,10170}, {3545,16836}, {3575,16656}, {3830,13754}, {3832,9729}, {3839,5943}, {3845,9730}, {3855,11695}, {3861,13491}, {4550,12083}, {5056,17704}, {5059,13348}, {5076,5446}, {5447,17800}, {5640,13570}, {5651,21312}, {5663,14831}, {5946,14893}, {6102,12102}, {7418,10568}, {7998,15683}, {9818,22352}, {10282,14865}, {10301,10990}, {10982,12315}, {11017,15712}, {11190,11471}, {11216,11470}, {11241,11473}, {11242,11474}, {11243,11475}, {11244,11476}, {11430,13596}, {11456,13366}, {11459,15682}, {11472,18534}, {11744,15321}, {11746,17856}, {11820,22112}, {12099,17853}, {12111,13598}, {12112,15033}, {12292,13417}, {13363,23046}, {13399,13567}, {13403,16659}, {13419,18560}, {13445,13595}, {13488,16655}, {14269,16226}, {15058,15644}, {15082,15692}, {15684,23039}, {15752,31978}, {15761,18488}, {16658,18400}, {16980,31673}, {18356,18555}, {19124,19153}, {19169,19209}, {19416,32070}, {19417,32071}</p>
<p>
X(32062) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these lines: {i,j}: {4, 11455}, {51, 11381}, {382, 18435}, {2979, 3146}, {3543, 15305}, {11459, 15682}, {15684, 23039}<br>
X(32062) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (20, 3819), (51, 4), (185, 51), (2979, 5907), (3534, 10170), (3917, 15030), (5562, 18435), (5650, 16261), (5946, 14893), (9730, 3845), (11381, 11455), (11455, 13474), (14855, 5), (15030, 16194), (15072, 5943), (16226, 14269), (17853, 12099)<br>
X(32062) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 11381, 185), (4, 12290, 389), (4, 13474, 11381)<br>
</p>
